Summary: white circular shape changing object above Koreatown, east hollywood
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around July 10th 2011
divs: sighting detailswhite shape changing object above koreatown\south eastern hollywood. some distance up in the air, possibly a mile, watched it change shape and hover over our area of visibility. believe it ended up traveling north. silver\whiteish, possibly reflective, multiple witnesses. appeared spherical, then l-shaped, back to circular. second time i've seen it, this time it was a lot higher than last.
